blogPost.excerpt: We make shapes that can talk. Shapes with personalities, with edges and corners.
blogPost.body: We make shapes that can talk. Shapes with personalities, with edges and corners.
blogPost.title: Circle - GPT-3 powered bots
blogPost.author: Anushk

localize.description: 我们制造会说话的形状。形状有个性，有边和角。
我們製造會說話的形狀。形狀有個性，有邊和角。

previous.excerpt: Download all sorts of goodies you can email to friends and family. Don't stroll the mall, scroll the list. Save lives by staying home and emailing your gifts to your favorite bootstrappers, self funders and indiehackers.
previous.title: Digital Stocking Stuffers - $1 or less digital products

localize.description: 下载各种可以通过电子邮件发送给朋友和家人的好东西。不要在商场里闲逛，滚动清单。呆在家里，把你的礼物通过电子邮件寄给你最喜欢的自助者、自助者和独立黑客，这样可以拯救生命。
下載各種可以通過電子郵件發送給朋友和家人的好東西。不要在商場裏閒逛，滾動清單。呆在家裏，把你的禮物通過電子郵件寄給你最喜歡的自助者、自助者和獨立黑客，這樣可以拯救生命。

next.excerpt: InCharge X is the world's only 100W 6-in-1 keyring cable. Thanks to its 6 charging combinations, you can charge almost any device at super high speed. Available in a 5 foot long version, too!
next.title: InCharge X - The 100W Swiss Army knife of cables

localize.description: InCharge X是世界上唯一的100W 6合1钥匙扣电缆。多亏了它的6种充电组合，你几乎可以在超高速下给任何设备充电。也有5英尺长的版本可供选择！
InCharge X是世界上唯一的100W 6合1鑰匙扣電纜。多虧了它的6種充電組合，你幾乎可以在超高速下給任何設備充電。也有5英尺長的版本可供選擇！
